name: Badge

jtbd.functional: Convey status, category, or count at a glance. A compact visual indicator that communicates metadata without requiring interaction.
jtbd.affordance: Pill-shaped label with color coding. Users immediately recognize this as a status indicator — not interactive, purely informational.
jtbd.emotional: Provides at-a-glance confidence about state. Maturity badges (draft/candidate/stable/deprecated) are a novel contribution — they signal the governance state of components within the terrarium itself.

anatomy.badge: .t-badge — Inline-flex pill with icon + text, full-radius border

maturity.draft: .t-badge--draft — Dashed amber border. Signals hypothesis stage.
maturity.candidate: .t-badge--candidate — Solid blue border. Signals validation stage.
maturity.stable: .t-badge--stable — Solid green border. Signals proven solution.

accessibility.role: status (for dynamic badges) or none (for static labels)
accessibility.ariaLabel: Badge text should be descriptive. Avoid color-only meaning — text must convey the status.
accessibility.screenReader: Badge content announced as inline text. No special ARIA needed for static badges.
accessibility.contrast: All badge variants meet 4.5:1 text contrast in both light and dark themes.

knownIssues: No dot-only variant for minimal status indication
Maturity badges are a novel pattern — no established WAI-ARIA precedent
futureConsiderations: Count badge variant with max display (99+)
Badge as overlay on Avatar or Icon
